titles.title: A resolution relating to a survey of the shores of the State of South Carolina in the interest of beach erosion control, hurricane protection, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 3/16/1988--Introduced. Directs the Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works to request the Secretary of the Army to direct the Chief of Engineers to make a survey of the shores of South Carolina in the interest of beach erosion control, hurricane protection, and related purposes.
